snippet: The rupture within the movement of Silvio Berlusconi was led by his longtime protégé, who announced he would refuse to join Mr. Berlusconi’s rebranded party.
abstract: Former Italian Prime Minister Silvio Berlusconi's center-right political movement splits, signalling new, uncertain chapter in Italian politics; breakaway group is led by Angelino Alfano, Berlusconi's longtime protege.
lead_paragraph: The rupture within the movement of Silvio Berlusconi was led by his longtime protégé, who announced he would refuse to join Mr. Berlusconi’s rebranded party.

headline.main: Defection of Longtime Ally Splits Center-Right in Italy
headline.print_headline: Defection of Longtime Ally Splits Center-Right in Italy
